course_description: This is an introduction to drugs and their effects on society and behavior. Specifically, drug regulations and laws will be covered as well as how drugs interact with the brain to alter consciousness. Previous coursework in college-level science courses strongly encouraged.
sections: Class Nbr: 3942, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. McGee, Status: Open
